hero.title: What if you're only using 10% of your true potential?
hero.subtitle: Discover the hidden 90% that could transform your life
hero.description: Most people never discover their hidden strengths. Our assessment reveals what's possible when you unlock your full potential.

successGap.question: Why do some people achieve their dreams while others just dream?
successGap.hook: Understanding success factors is the difference between dreaming and achieving. Most people focus on motivation, but research shows it's actually about specific, measurable habits that compound over time.

changeParadox.question: You know what to do. So why aren't you doing it?
changeParadox.hook: The gap between knowing and doing isn't about willpower—it's about understanding how your brain's automatic systems work. Once you master this, lasting change becomes inevitable.

visionVoid.question: Can you describe your life 5 years from now in detail?
visionVoid.hook: Vision clarity is the foundation of all achievement. Without it, you're like a ship without a compass—you might be moving, but you're not going anywhere meaningful. Clear vision transforms everything.

leadershipLever.question: Are you leading your life, or is life leading you?
leadershipLever.hook: Leadership isn't just about managing others—it's about mastering yourself first. Your leadership style determines your impact in every area of life, from career to relationships to personal growth.

decisionDoor.question: You're standing at the Decision Door
decisionDoor.hook: Every moment of inaction has a cost. Every day you wait, the gap between where you are and where you could be grows wider. The question isn't whether you can afford to invest in yourself—it's whether you can afford not to.
